content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.rate_code_id') AS SMALLINT) rate_code_id,
        CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.rate_code') AS VARCHAR(15)) rate_code
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'raw/rate_code.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '1.0', 
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS rate_code;
